name: "Draw Your Cuddle" - soft toy
description:
it is easy: you draw and i sew...

When you buy a "Draw Your Cuddle", you recieve a unique soft toy that is created by yourself !!!
Each drawing by your child, a little sketch or painting that you send me, I will breathe some life into ... if it´s a monster or a lovely doll, a crazy animal or just a fantastic something - everything is possible...

You can send your design to this address: 
drawyourcuddle@fiaba.de

For some examples have a look at my homepage:
http://fiaba.de/category/zeichne-dein-kuscheltier/gefertigtes/

Your "Draw your cuddle" will be around 40 cm tall, made of 100 % cotton or fleece and stuffed with high-quality cotton wool.

After receipt of payment your cuddly toy usually will be shipped within seven days. 


I´m looking forward to your ideas... :)
